volume_down.title: Stereo System | Decrease the Volume
volume_down.desc: Decreases the volume of the currently playing track

volume_up.title: Stereo System | Increase the Volume
volume_up.desc: Increases the volume of the currently playing track

toggle_shuffle_on_off.title: Stereo System | Toggle Shuffle Mode
toggle_shuffle_on_off.desc: Toggles shuffle mode on or off

scan_for_new_tracks.title: Stereo System | Scan for New Tracks
scan_for_new_tracks.desc: Scans for new tracks that have been added to the music folder during gameplay

toggle_repeat.title: Stereo System | Toggle Repeat Mode
toggle_repeat.desc: Toggles repeat mode between song, playlist, or off

previous_track.title: Stereo System | Previous Track
previous_track.desc: Tap to play the previous track or restart the current one, and hold down to toggle shuffle mode on or off

play_pause.title: Stereo System | Play/Pause Current Track
play_pause.desc: Plays or pauses the current track

next_track.title: Stereo System | Next Track
next_track.desc: Tap to play the next track, and hold down to toggle the stereo system on or off

toggle_stereo_on_off.title: Stereo System | Toggle Stereo System
toggle_stereo_on_off.desc: Toggles the stereo system on or off
